Detailed Description

Define t_nmf_panic_data type.

This is the data structure passed to the service callback (inside t_nmf_service_data) when t_nmf_service_type == NMF_SERVICE_PANIC

Field Documentation

union { ... } t_nmf_panic_data::info

union of structures containing specific info, depending on the panicSource
